title: AI and Automation Intern
description:
**Swed Fintech – Build High-Impact Automation and Systems for a Global Finance & AI Infrastructure - Swedish Praktik (Stockholm)** 




  





*Are you a tech-savvy who loves automation, building systems, and finding smarter ways to run complex operations? Do you get excited about connecting APIs, integrating tools, and creating dashboards that make teams dramatically more efficient?* 




  





 Swed Fintech (Stockholm) is offering a high-performance Praktik where you will build real systems used daily across a global hedge fund, media, and financial education group.
 



  





 Our operations span New York, London, Zurich, and Stockholm, and we rely heavily on internal automations, AI tools, CRM integrations, and data pipelines.
 



  





 If you want a practical, high-impact internship where your work has
 *real users* 
 and real visibility — this is it.
 



  





 This Praktik is unpaid, similar to practical training programs across Sweden and Europe, with significant professional development.
 



  





**About the Role** 




 You will help architect, automate, and integrate workflows across:
 



  




* **Zapier, Make.com** 
 and custom automation pipelines
* **Salesforce** 
 (data syncing, custom objects, field mapping, API flows)
* **Google Sheets** 
 automation, dashboards, field protection, permissions
* Email automation via
 **Klaviyo, Mailchimp, or native API**
* Integrating dialer data + AI insights into Sheets / CRM
* Building internal tools for team members to save, update, or retrieve data cleanly
* CMS work (Wix or similar) using Sheets / APIs to sync content
* Organizational efficiency systems: smart reminders, data pipelines, triggers, tagging
* Optional: AI automations using GPT, Claude, or other models
* **Optional** 
 : Python programming for trading systems



  





 You will work closely with senior management and see how your automation system becomes the backbone of ongoing investor outreach, content pipelines, and operational workflows.
 



  





**Responsibilities** 



* Build and maintain automations using
 **Zapier** 
 or
 **Make**
* Integrate Salesforce with Google Sheets using secure, controlled field mapping
* Set up Sheets → CRM → email platform automations
* Create dashboards and automations for the team (filters, protected ranges, access tiers)
* Develop workflows for Mailchimp/Klaviyo campaigns triggered by Sheets or CRM entries
* Streamline data storage and retrieval processes in Salesforce
* Help build automation systems for investor outreach and intern management
* Optional: contribute to AI-powered analysis dashboards or workflow scripts
* Optional: update CMS (Wix or other) with automated content flows



  





**We Are Looking For Candidates Who** 



* Are studying computer science, IT, engineering, automation, or similar
* Enjoy building systems more than “just coding” — you love operational tech
* Have experience (or strong willingness to learn) automation tools like Zapier or Make
* Are comfortable with Google Sheets formulas, structures, and permissions
* Have interest in CRM systems (Salesforce experience is a plus)
* Can think in systems, blocks, and flows — not random tasks
* Want to see their work used across multiple business divisions
* Are detail-oriented, structured, and self-directed
* Bonus: familiarity with APIs, Webhooks, Wix, CMS, or AI tools



  





**What You Will Gain** 



* Real automation engineering experience inside a cross-border fintech + hedge fund ecosystem
* Experience working with Salesforce integrations and CRM workflow design
* Mastery of Zapier / Make automations and data-flow architecture
* Exposure to AI-powered tools and automation logic
* Portfolio-ready systems that you built end-to-end
* A rare internship environment where your output matters and is used globally
* Potential for follow-on internships in engineering, data, or fintech operations



  





**Internship Details** 



* **Company:** 
 Swed Fintech AB
* **Location:** 
 Stockholm
* **Structure:** 
 Unpaid Praktik (in line with Swedish internship norms)
* **Schedule:** 
 Flexible with school/exam needs
* **Start Dates:** 
 Rolling
* **Commitment:** 
 Onsite because of high trust systems access. 4 to 5 days a week.



  





**Cross-Internship Opportunities** 




 Upon successful completion, high-performing interns may be considered for additional internships or expanded roles in fintech engineering, hedge fund operations, or investor-facing workflows across our global offices (Stockholm, London, New York, Zurich).

title: Media Analyst (Measurement & Attribution)
description:
**Job Description**

 We are seeking a
 **Media Analyst** 
 (Measurement & Attribution) to join our global marketing analytics team at H&M. This is a hands-on, insight-driven role ideal for someone who thrives at the intersection of data, media, and business impact. You’ll deliver actionable insights to global and regional marketing teams, helping optimize media investments and drive marketing effectiveness across channels.
   

  

  

  

**WHAT YOU’LL DO** 
  

  

 As a Media Analyst, you will play a key role in how we measure and optimize the performance of our marketing efforts. Your responsibilities include:
   

  




* Analyse media performance across channels by applying insights from advanced marketing analytics techniques such as Marketing Mix Modeling (MMM), Regression-Based Attribution (RBA), scenario modeling, and media mix evaluation.
* Generate actionable insights, recommend budget reallocations, and guide strategy adjustments to improve ROI and support growth.
* Build and present reports and dashboards that clearly communicate insights to global and regional stakeholders.
* Gather, organize, and validate data from multiple media sources, ensuring consistency and accuracy.
* Partner with regional marketing teams to support local implementation and ensure global consistency.
* Collaborate closely with the Attribution Lead to align on methodology, priorities, and the measurement roadmap, while contributing to a test-and-learn culture by continuously refining approaches based on performance insights.
* Work with cross-functional teams including media, CRM, strategy, finance, and technical product teams to embed insights into planning and execution.



**WHO YOU’LL WORK WITH** 
  

  

 You’ll be part of the Measurement & Analytics team within the Global Marketing function, collaborating with media operations, CRM, strategy and planning, controlling, technical product teams, and regional marketing teams. You’ll also work closely with the Attribution Lead to ensure insights drive measurable business impact.
   

  





**WHO YOU ARE**




 We are looking for someone with...
   

  




* 3-5 years of experience in media analytics, preferably from a media agency, global retailer, or measurement supplier.
* Strong understanding of media KPIs and how to steer performance across digital channels.
* Familiarity with experimentation, incrementality testing, attribution, or media mix modeling.
* Experience with tools such as GA4, Meta Ads Manager, Google Ads, and visualization platforms like Power BI or Looker Studio.
* Understanding of privacy-first innovation in measurement systems.
* Strong business acumen with the ability to connect insights to broader marketing and commercial objectives.
* Proactive team player with strong communication skills, able to simplify technical concepts and drive data-driven marketing in a global, fast-paced environment.
* Background in digital marketing or paid media is a strong plus, especially if combined with analytical capabilities.



**WHO WE ARE**
  

 H&M Group is a global company of strong fashion brands and ventures. Our goal is to prove that there is no compromise between exceptional design, affordable prices, and sustainable solutions. We want to liberate fashion for the many, and our customers are at the heart of every decision we make.​
   

  





 We are made up of thousands of passionate and talented colleagues united by our shared culture and values. Together, we want to use our power, our scale, and our knowledge to push the fashion industry towards a more inclusive and sustainable future. ​ ​
   

  





  

  

**WHY YOU’LL LOVE WORKING HERE**
  

 At H&M Group, we are proud to be a vibrant and welcoming company. We offer our employees attractive benefits with extensive development opportunities around the globe.
   

  




* 25% Staff discount on all our H&M Group brands, both in stores and online (H&M, COS, Weekday, Monki, H&M HOME, & Other Stories and ARKET).
* H&M Incentive Program – HIP. Learn more about the program here.



**JOIN US​**
  

 This is a permanent position based in Stockholm.
   

  





 Our uniqueness comes from a combination of many things – our inclusive and collaborative culture, our strong values, and opportunities for growth. But most of all, it’s our people who make us who we are.​
   

  





 Take the next step in your career together with us. The journey starts here.​
   

  

 \*We are committed to a recruitment process that is fair, equitable, and based on competency. We therefore kindly ask you to not attach a cover letter in your application.​

title: Data Engineer
description:
**Data Engineer -** 
 Working with MLOps and Scalable Data Pipelines
   

  

 We are looking for a Data Engineer to join our growing team and play a key role in shaping the infrastructure and workflows that power data, machine learning, and analytics at Froda.
   

  

**About The Role**
 To power our growing ambitions, we are expanding our data & ML capabilities. As a Data Engineer at Froda, you’ll help build the technical backbone behind our next generation of credit risk models, fraud detection systems, and automation processes, leveraging data, AI, and machine learning to create scalable and intelligent financing solutions.
   

  

 You’ll work closely with data scientists, analysts, and other stakeholders to deliver production-ready pipelines and platforms that drive real business impact across the company.
   

  

 You will collaborate with the team to consistently deliver value, enhance our technical architecture, and guarantee the reliability and scalability of our systems, all while upholding compliance and governance standards.
   

  

**Who are you?**
 We believe that you are a systems-oriented engineer who is passionate about enabling machine learning and analytics at scale. You’re curious, analytical, and love turning complex problems into robust technical solutions. You enjoy collaborating across teams, sharing knowledge, and contributing to a data-first culture.
   

  

**Your Experience**
 We expect you to have professional experience working with scalable data pipelines, MLOps, modern cloud-based tooling, and data driven products. This is typically gained after 2 to 5+ years of experience from tech- and product-driven companies, but highly skilled candidates with slightly less experience are also encouraged to apply.
   

  

 More specifically, we are looking for you with hands-on experience of:
   

  

* Designing and building robust data pipelines in production environments
* Working with cloud-based data warehouses (e.g., Snowflake) and streaming platforms (e.g., Kafka)
* Building and maintaining ML-Ops platforms or similar infrastructures
* Feature stores and reusable ML pipelines.
* Working with Python, SQL, and orchestration tools like Airflow or DBT
* Using Docker and Kubernetes, and deploying models via APIs (e.g., FastAPI)
* Cloud platforms such as Azure or similar
* Data modeling and implementation of data governance and management practices.


 As Swedish is our primary working language, we’re looking for someone who’s fluent in both Swedish and English.
   

  

**What’s in it for you?**
 At Froda, you’ll be part of a company that combines the best of both worlds – a fast-moving, high-energy culture with the stability and structure to support long-term success. We’re 100+ ambitious self-starters who genuinely care for each other and the work we do, all while having fun together.
   

  

 Here, you’ll have the opportunity to take ownership of your work, develop your skills, and shape your own growth journey. With big ambitions and a rapidly evolving business, there’s plenty of room to grow, lead initiatives, and make a real impact on both our company and the industry. If you're looking to be part of a success story and contribute to something bigger, this is the place for you.
   

  

 Furthermore, you’ll get:
   

  

* An opportunity to be part of an exciting journey, shaping the future of our company and transforming the SME financing landscape
* Fabulous office overlooking Stockholm and a friendly culture that values work/life balance
* We prioritize working in the office to maximize the positive impact of in-person collaboration, but we offer flexibility with work hours and remote work
* Competitive compensation package
* Insurance and pension plan


 If you're excited by our mission of building the data foundations that powers funding for thousands of entrepreneurs, apply or tell a friend!

title: OT & IT Systemadministratör
description:
**Företagsbeskrivning**
 AFRY erbjuder tjänster inom teknik, design, digitalisering och rådgivning. Vi är hängivna experter inom industri, energi- och infrastruktur, som skapar värde för kommande generationer. AFRY har en global räckvidd med djupa rötter i Norden. Tillsammans accelererar vi omställningen till ett mer hållbart samhälle.
   

  

**Jobbeskrivning**
 Är du redo att ta din tekniska karriär till nästa nivå? Vi söker dig som vill bli en nyckelspelare i övergången mellan traditionell IT och industriell teknologi (OT). Om du har erfarenhet från IT-världen och lockas av industrins unika utmaningar, är det här rätt plats för dig.
   

  

**Kvalifikationer**
 Vi rekryterar nu en eller flera drivna OT -eller IT Systemadministratörer för ett spännande uppdrag hos en av våra kunder i Stockholmsområdet. Du blir en del av ett dedikerat team från AFRY som arbetar uteslutande på plats hos kunden, med möjlighet till flexibelt distansarbete när tillfälle ges.
   

  

 Skall krav:
   

  

* Minst fem års erfarenhet som IT- eller OT-teknisk systemadministratör
* Kunna granska och föreslå nätverksförändingar, inkluderat nätverksinfrastruktur, segmentering och säkerhet
* Erfarenhet av att konfigurera switchar och brandväggar i ett segmenteringsarbete
* Erfarenhet av arbete i Microsoft-plattformar, operativsystem och applikationer
* Lägst gymnasial utbildning med inriktning mot IT eller teknik


 Meriterande:
   

  

* Erfarenhet av säkerhet, säkerhetskopiering och katastrofåterställning
* Erfarenhet från livscykelhantering (LCM) och tjänster i slutet av livscykeln
* Kännedom och erfarenhet av produktionsmiljöer (t.ex. gruvor, fabriker)


 Arbetet som konsult på AFRY innebär att vara konsultmässig, samverka i team och ha hög leveranskapacitet. På AFRY arbetar vi mot Client Centric som innebär, att hålla kunden i fokus.
   

  

 Svenskt medborgarskap kan krävas för vissa befattningar. Säkerhetsprövning och bakgrundskontroller är obligatoriska för försvarsrelaterade roller.
   

  

**Ytterligare information**
 Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!
   

  

 Sista ansökningsdag 9 januari 2026. Intervjuer påbörjas mitten av januari månad.
   

  

**Kontaktperson för frågor:**
 Michael Blom, michael.blom@afry.com
   

  

 Sektionschef OT&IT Säkerhet
   

  

 Ellinor Danielsson, ellinor.danielsson@afry.com
   

  

 Rekryteringspartner AFRY
   

  

*Vi undanber oss direktkontakt med bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag samt säljare av ytterligare jobbannonser.*
*På AFRY driver vi förändring i allt vi gör. Vi anser att förändring sker när modiga idéer möts, när vi samarbetar, skapar innovation och omfamnar kreativa lösningar, det är så vi skapar framtiden. Vi söker konstant kvalificerade kandidater som vill ansluta sig till våra inkluderande team runt om i världen. Bli en del av oss och påskynda den gröna omställningen*

title: Sales Intern
description:
**Swedish Praktik - Launch Your Career in Investment Banking, Hedge Funds, Private Equity, Investor Relations & Global Capital Strategy** 




  





**Sales Internship – Based in Stockholm, Sweden and Part of Global Hedge Fund Platform in New York, Connecticut, London, Zurich and Stockholm via International Institutional Platform** 




  





*Are you a driven, globally minded student (bachelor or master) or recent graduate with ambitions in hedge funds, trading, investment banking, or institutional sales? Do you want hands-on exposure to how real capital is raised, structured, and allocated across borders? Are you not shy to pick up the phone and call an investor to find out if they are a good fit for us?* 




  





 This internship is a career launchpad into investment management, business development, investor relations and allocator strategy, offering rare visibility into how elite funds engage with institutions, family offices, and HNW investors. We are an international hedge fund with a global macro and volatility edge, and an affiliate of Swiss Finance, a respected financial institution with presence in Zurich, London, New York, and Stockholm.
 



  





 Join a high-performance, elite investment team of a Quant Investment Fund where excellence isn’t a buzzword - it’s the baseline. We're searching for rare talent ready to dive into real strategy, real outreach, and real impact from day one.
 



  





**About the Company:** 




  





 With decades of experience in investment management, we are now offering driven individuals the opportunity to gain first-hand exposure to how capital is allocated in the real world—beyond the academic setting.
 



  





 Ideal for candidates with experience in, or interested in investment banking, private equity, or hedge funds.
 



  





**About the Internship:** 




 This is a rare opportunity to work directly with senior management in a real hedge fund environment. You’ll gain exposure to the capital raising process from institutional investors, family offices, and high-net-worth individuals. Interns will interact with industry-standard and cutting-edge tools and learn the mindset and mechanics behind how allocators think, assess, and deploy capital.
 



  





**Responsibilities:** 



* Research, call and map capital allocators: family offices, institutional investors, pension funds, and more
* Reach out to HNW, FO, I.I. allocators to qualify, exchange documents, set meetings
* Assist in developing outreach strategies, investor communications, and presentation materials
* Potential to conduct direct outreach (email/phone) and build rapport with allocators on behalf of the fund
* Analyze investor profiles using professional databases
* Support meetings and participate in follow-up workflows
* Conduct ongoing research and reporting on investor trends and capital flows
* Lead generation strategies



  





**We Are Looking for Candidates Who:** 



* Finance, economics, or investments (students or graduates)
* Have a deep interest in asset management, hedge funds, and macroeconomic dynamics
* Are self-driven, structured, and detail-oriented
* Thrive in a fast-paced, high-performance environment
* Are proactive, persistent, and elegant in following up with prospects across channels (email, phone, social media)



  





**What You Will Gain:** 



* Practical understanding of capital raising and allocator psychology within the hedge fund space
* Insight into investor pitches, due diligence processes, and fund communications
* Hands-on experience with CRM systems, outreach workflows, and AI-based research tools
* Resume-building credentials for future roles in investment banking, private equity, or asset management



  





 Internship Details:
 


* On-site mostly.
* Full time but flexibility for exams or other such commitments.
* This is highly selective - tailored for those ready to step beyond the academic and into the world of real capital allocation.
* The internship has a significant training and professional development component, therefore it is unpaid.

title: Systemtekniker Riksdagsförvaltningen
description:
**Professional Galaxy** 
 är ett IT- och teknikkonsultbolag som tillhandahåller högspecialiserad kompetens inom IT, mjukvaruutveckling, SAP, inköp, elektronik och mekanisk konstruktion. Vi samarbetar med erfarna seniora experter och levererar strategiskt värdeskapande kompetens till några av Sveriges mest komplexa och analytiskt krävande projekt. Vårt fokus ligger alltid på hög kvalitet, professionalism och tydliga, mätbara resultat.
   

  

 Är du rätt person för uppdraget, eller vill du rekommendera en stark kandidat? Tveka inte att kontakta oss.
   

  

 Ansök gärna redan idag, urval och intervjuer sker löpande.
   

  

 Vi söker nu en
 **Systemtekniker Riksdagsförvaltningen** 
 hos var kund.
   

  

**Om uppdraget**
 Denna avropsförfrågan omfattar en konsulttjänst som Systemtekniker. Preliminär start för konsulttjänsten beräknas till mars/april 2026.
   

  

 De söker en systemtekniker med god teknisk kompetens och flera års erfarenhet av drift och förvaltning av it-system. Uppdraget omfattar i huvudsak drift, underhåll, förvaltning och utveckling av it-system både i Windows- och Linux-miljö. Konsulten kommer tillhöra en grupp som tillsammans ansvarar för uppdraget.
   

  

 I det här uppdraget är det av stor vikt att konsulten har god förmåga att samarbeta och kommunicera. I uppdraget ingår viss kvällstjänstgöring. Tjänstgöring på helger förekommer endast vid enstaka tillfälle och är inte vanligt förekommande.
   

  

 Konsulten ska vara tillgänglig för intervju. Intervjun genomförs på kontorstid och tar ca 1 timme.
   

  

**Ska-krav:**
* Kompetensnivå 4 (9-12 år).
* Konsulten ska ha minst 4 års arbetslivserfarenhet från och med 1 januari 2018 av drift och förvaltning av Windows-servrar i stora miljöer (över 1000 klienter).
* Konsulten ska ha minst 4 års arbetslivserfarenhet rån och med 1 januari 2018 av att ha arbetet med webbservrar, exempelvis IIS, Apache, Nginx m.m, i stora miljöer (över 1000 klienter).
* Konsulten ska ha minst 4 års arbetslivserfarenhet från och med 1 januari 2018 av scripting, exempelvis Powershell, Bash, Python m.m, i stora miljöer (över 1000 klienter).
* Konsulten ska ha minst 4 års arbetslivserfarenhet från och med 1 januari 2018 av SQL i stora miljöer (över 1000 klienter).
* Konsulten ska ha minst 4 års arbetslivserfarenhet från och med 1 januari 2018 av DNS, TCP/IP, brandväggar, routing och felsökning i stora miljöer (över 1000 klienter).
* Konsulten ska ha minst 3 års arbetslivserfarenhet från och med 1 januari 2018 av att ha automatiserat vanliga arbetsuppgifter med PowerShell i stora miljöer (över 1000 klienter).
* Konsulten ska minst 3 års arbetslivserfarenhet från och med 1 januari 2018 av övervakningsverktyg, exempelvis System Center Operations Manager eller Zabbix, i stora miljöer (över 1000 klienter).
* Konsulten ska ha god förmåga att kommunicera muntligt och skriftligt på svenska med andra personer, såväl verksamhetens användare som it-specialister, god samarbetsförmåga samt förmåga att arbeta i och anpassa sig till en grupp.


**Bör-krav:**
 N/A
   

  

**Omfattning** 
 :
   

  

 100%
   

  

**Stationeringsort** 
 :
   

  

 Stockholm, viss möjlighet till distansarbete.
   

  

**Start-slut + option:**
 Mars/april 2026 - 2 år + option: upp till 2 år.
   

  

**Startdatum:** 
 2026-04-01
   

  

**Slutdatum:** 
 2028-03-31
   

  

**Sista ansökningsdag** 
 : 2026-01-09
   

  

 Ansök genom att bifoga ditt CV (vi vill inte ha något personligt brev) och besvara urvalsfrågorna. Frågorna utgår från kravprofilen för den här rekryteringen och dina svar ligger till grund för det urval som sker i processen. Att besvara frågorna är en förutsättning för att din ansökan ska anses komplett.
   

  

 Vänligen notera att krav och eventuella meriter ska vara uppfyllda vid ansökningstillfället.

title: Electrical Technician
description:
We are looking for
 **2 Electrical Technicians** 
 that will report to the Project Leader or Installation manager as immediate manager and in day-to-day work to the Arbetsledare/Supervisor.
   

  

 The position will be field based, working from various locations of SICE Nordics project sites.
 **The first technician will work at E4 Förbifart Stockholm - ByPass, and the other, will work in the tunnel of the Yellow Line of Metro.**
 It is an on-site or in-house servicing, repair and/or installation of company product(s).
 *This job will include field support and installation of data cables, installation of cabinets, sensors, cameras, variable message signs, switches, and other monitoring equipment installations.*
**Essential Duties And Responsibilities**
  Follow supervisor’s directions for all tasks
   

  

  Read and understand project documents such as plans and specifications
   

  

  Support in overall installation and maintenance activities in the field of technical systems for metro, tunnel and road projects.
   

  

  Installs equipment including but not limited to cameras, detectors, cabinets, switches, radio etc.
   

  

  Installs pull boxes and conduit.
   

  

  Installation of different types of cables, including pulling cable and installation of cable in conduits
   

  

  Connect and terminates comms cables (UTP RJ45 for CAT5 and CAT6, coax) to equipment.
   

  

  Connect electrical conductors to power services to energize equipment.
   

  

  Overall support to testing team to verify devices’ functionality.
   

  

  Execution of periodic maintenance activities for installed systems.
   

  

  Prepares logs to keep track of field conditions and installation activities, daily journal (dagbok).
   

  

  Assists Arbetsledare/Supervisor in various aspects related to installation works.
   

  

  Other duties may be assigned.
   

  

  Perform duties at multiple construction sites, simultaneously.
   

  

 Working Conditions and Physical Effort
   

  

  This position involves work at a construction site (such as on and around roadways, tunnels, bridges) where duties will be performed both indoors and outdoors.
   

  

  Overtime may be required to meet project deadlines
   

  

  Dexterity of hands and fingers to operate a computer keyboard, mouse and other business machines, as well as hand tools and power tools.
   

  

  While performing the duties of this Job, the employee is regularly required to stand and walk; Use hands; Reach with hands and arms; Climb or balance; stoop, kneel, crouch.
   

  

  The employee must occasionally lift and/or move up heavy equipment/materials.
   

  

  Occasional night work may occur.
   

  

  The employee must report daily activities via tools/software provided by the employer.
   

  

**Desired Skills**
  Construction experience
   

  

  Entry level mechanical ability
   

  

  Mid-level electrical (low voltage) and or technical knowledge of control and monitoring
   

  

 systems.
   

  

  Take responsibility for tasks and deadlines, as well as quality of work.
   

  

  Sees opportunities and willingness to develop
   

  

  Open to develop professional skills and contributes to colleagues’ learning and growing.
   

  

  Good at collaboration, teamwork skills.
   

  

  Proactiveness, takes activities if idle and works on them with full responsibility until completion.
   

  

**Preferred Skills And Experience**
  Minimum of 3 years of verifiable experience, with knowledge in technical areas such as electrical, security systems / Intelligent Transportation Systems and the like.
   

  

  Electrical and fiber optic knowledge (ability to read and interpret electrical and fiber optic plans) is preferred.
   

  

  Experience in tunnel and road systems (intelligent transportation, access controls, radio, CCTVs) and/or electronics/computers/networking is preferred.
   

  

  Ability to use Microsoft Office (Excel, Teams, word, outlook), basic level.
   

  

  Ability to read and interpret documents such as plans and specifications, safety rules, operating and maintenance instructions, and procedure manuals.
   

  

  Previous experience working in road and tunnels industry, for projects with public customers (Trafikverket, FUT) preferred.
   

  

 Education
   

  

  High school diploma or general education degree (GED) required.
   

  

  Electrician education (The National Electrical Safety Board authorization) preferred.
   

  

  Telecommunication education preferred.
   

  

  Certificate for operating aerial work platforms (IPAF PAL card or equivalent) preferred.
   

  

**Others**
*** Must demonstrate eligibility to work in Sweden (Based in Stockholm).***
*** Possession of a valid Swedish driver's license is a requirement for this job.***
 Job Type: Full-time
   

  

 Pay: 31 000,00kr — 39 000,00kr per month
   

  

**Experience**
* technician: 3 year (Required)


**Language**
* English (Required)


**Work Authorization**
* Sweden (Required)


 Work Location: In person
   

  

 Fill in the form, we will contact you...

title: Marketing & Management Assistant
description:
*With its beginnings in a family run pharmacy in Correggio, Italy in the 1920s, Recordati is now a global pharmaceutical company, listed on the Italian stock exchange, with over 4,500 employees and turnover of over Euro 2bn.
   

  

 We are a group of like-minded, passionate individuals who go to extraordinary lengths for our patients, customers, partners, investors and the people across the globe who we serve. We develop and commercialise medicines to serve people living with common diseases, as well as those living with some of the rarest, in around 150 countries.
   

  

 At Recordati, our mantra is simple. We’ve always believed that health, and the opportunity to live life to the fullest, is a right, not a privilege. Whether that is for common diseases or the rarest – we want to give people the opportunity to be the best version of themselves.
   

  

 This drive will never stop. Together, we will always be reimagining tomorrow – with new ideas, new technologies and new innovations to fight diseases.
   

  

 Recordati. Unlocking the full potential of life.*
**Job Purpose**
 The purpose of the Marketing & Management Assistant Nordic role is to provide comprehensive administrative and operational support to the General Manager and the broader Marketing, Medical, and Sales teams. This position ensures the smooth execution of general and financial administration processes, assists in the coordination and management of marketing and sales projects, and upholds compliance with national and internal guidelines. By handling agreements, supporting event management, and facilitating communication across departments, the role contributes to the effective functioning and success of the organization’s activities in the Nordic region.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
 General and financial administration (SAP, Synertrade, P2P, PO’s).
   

  

 Administration of marketing and sales projects, sales cycle meetings, Omnichannel/Digital channels, CRM set up (OCE-P/D), Hubspot, ON24 (webinars). Event management (sales cycle meetings and company days)
   

  

 Administration and support to field employees.
   

  

 Support General Manager agreement with HCP/HCO administration, payment forms and payments.
   

  

 Marketing Compliance administration in Veeva system.
   

  

 IT coordination of our external and internal support.
   

  

 Comply to National Law´s, National Ethical guidelines (EFPIA local such as but not limited to LIF Sweden, PIC Finland, LMI Norway, ENLI Denmark), Local and regional guidelines, internal SOP´s, GDP, Safety reporting (PV), QA and medical info
   

  

**Required Education**
 Minimum high school education, university education would be advantageous.
   

  

**Required Skills And Experience**
 Fluent in Swedish and English (verbal/written), understanding other Scandinavian languages would be advantageous.
   

  

 Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
   

  

 Competent in the use of Microsoft Office tools with strong Excel skills.
   

  

 Experience working with invoices and POs.
   

  

 Experience within general administration or marketing administration.
   

  

**Technical Competencies**
**Required Behaviours And Competencies**
 Strong team player working with cross-functional teams
   

  

 Able to prioritise work
   

  

 Able to work independently and with initiative
   

  

 Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
   

  

 Organised with great attention to detail and high level of accuracy
   

  

 Likes administrative and routine work
   

  

 Able to adapt and succeed in a changing environment
   

  

 Able to multitask and meet tight deadlines
   

  

**Required Languages**
 Fluent in Swedish and English, both written and spoken.
   

  

**Travel required in %**
 0%
   

  

*At Recordati we believe in people! Inspired by our purpose - unlocking the full potential of life - we are committed to creating a diverse environment and cultivating a culture of inclusion. We strive to continually lead with our values and beliefs, enabling our employees to bring their whole selves to work and develop their potential.*
*We are proud to be an equal opportunity employer. We recruit, develop and reward without regard to, amongst others, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, physical or mental ability, race, ethnicity, political or religious belief.*
*If you are looking to join a company where you can try new things, speak openly, and be bold, we invite you to apply today.*

title: Projektledare digitalisering och verksamhet – Telge AB
description:
Välj Telge – här får du kombinera affärsmässighet med samhällsnytta och som medarbetare får du frihet under ansvar och möjlighet att påverka.
   

  

**Så här säger Johan Sergelius, rekryterande chef om rollen:**
 "I din roll som projektledare får du innehållsrika och omväxlande dagar. Du kommer att driva varierande typer av uppdrag, projekt och program – allt från strategiska initiativ till operativa förbättringar. Hos oss får du möjlighet att arbeta nära verksamheten och skapa verklig nytta."
   

  

 Uppdrag och kompetenskrav
   

  

 Södertälje växer och vi på Telge AB är en viktig del av resan. Nu söker vi en erfaren projektledare som vill driva spännande projekt inom digitalisering och IT. Du får en central roll i att planera, koordinera och genomföra projekt som bidrar till en smartare och mer hållbar stad. Exempel på projekt kan vara införande av nya AI lösningar, utveckling av datadrivna beslutsstöd, samt automatisera processer som stärker hela kommunkoncernen. Du arbetar brett inom kommunkoncernen och blir en del av ett engagerat team som kombinerar struktur med kreativitet. Hos oss gör din kompetens verklig skillnad. I rollen ansvarar du för att driva och leda projekt samt att säkerställa kvalitet, tid och budget. Du blir också en del av vårt projektkontor där du bidrar till att förvalta och vidareutveckla våra metodiker inom projektledning, förändringsledning och nyttorealisering. Du leder digitaliserings- och verksamhetsprojekt enligt XLPM, analyserar direktiv och kravbild, planerar, organiserar och leder projektteam mot fastställda mål. Vidare ingår att hantera ekonomi, uppföljning och rapportering, stötta våra kunder med effekthemtagning och nyttorealisering och att ha en tät dialog med leverantörer och bygga goda relationer med våra kunder inom kommunkoncernen.
   

  

 För att passa i rollen ser vi att du har:
   

  

* Eftergymnasial utbildning, gärna med IT-inriktning eller motsvarande kompetens förvärvad på annat sätt
* Flera års erfarenhet av komplexa projekt, gärna inom digitalisering/verksamhetsutveckling
* Erfarenhet av projektmetodik såsom XLPM eller motsvarande, och av agila arbetssätt och vattenfallsmetoder


**Meriterande**
* Certifiering inom exempelvis IPMA, PMI eller Prince2, liksom kunskap om PM3 och ITIL
* Erfarenhet av projektverktyg som Antura eller liknande


 Som person ser vi att du är självständig, uthållig och kan jobba målmedvetet mot överenskomna leveransmål. Du är ansvarsfull, har förmågan att prioritera och ser helheten ur ett koncernperspektiv. Vi ser också att du har erfarenhet av att ställa krav mot leverantörer och har lätt för att uttrycka dig i tal och skrift.
   

  

**Välj Telge**
 Inom Telge finns alla möjligheter för dig att själv forma din framtid. Här finns det plats att växa, både i din yrkesroll och som människa. Telge är en arbetsplats med trygga anställningsvillkor. Du som anställd hos oss omfattas av kollektivavtal där viktiga saker som försäkringar och pension ingår.
   

  

 Här får du mindre pussel och mer liv. Att ha balans mellan arbetslivet och den privata sfären är viktig för ett hållbart liv. Så långt det är möjligt har vi flexibla arbetstider där var och en styr över sin tid. Vi har en rad förmåner som friskvårdsbidrag och möjlighet till löneväxling så att du kan växla in din lön mot extra tjänstepensionssparande.
   

  

 Läs mer om några av våra medarbetare som valt Telge: Vi valde Telge
   

  

**Mångfald inkludering och trygghet**
 Vi på Telge arbetar aktivt för mångfald och inkludering och välkomnar därför medarbetare med olika erfarenheter, bakgrunder och kompetenser. En trygg och säker arbetsmiljö är vår högsta prioritet. Arbetspsykologiska tester ingår i våra rekryteringsprocesser till chefs- och specialisttjänster och vi genomför återkommande, slumpmässiga drogtester bland alla våra medarbetare.
   

  

**Sista ansökningsdatum**
 7 januari 2026
   

  

**Några frågor?**
 Vill du veta mer om tjänsten eller har frågor om rekryteringsprocessen? I den här rekryteringen samarbetar vi med Experis IT. Vid frågor är du välkommen att kontakta ansvarig rekryteringskonsult Pia Boström på 0703-14 68 66 eller pia.bostrom@se.experis.com. Fackliga kontakter är vision@telge.se för Vision, Magnus Enderin för SACO, Jessica Borgen för Kommunal. Dessa nås på 08-550 220 00.
   

  

**Är du nyfiken på att läsa mer om oss?**
 Läs mer om oss som arbetsgivare: Jobba hos oss
   

  

 Läs mer om Telge AB

title: Information Governance Lead
description:
*Vill du vara med och forma framtidens informationshantering inom en av Sveriges ledande försäkringsaktörer? Som Informationsstyrningsansvarig SAK får du en central och strategisk roll där du driver viktiga initiativ och skapar affärsvärde ur information. Här får du möjligheten att leda, påverka och utveckla arbetet med informationsstyrning i en komplex och spännande miljö.*
**Om jobbet**
 I rollen som Informationsstyrningsansvarig SAK ansvarar du för att driva och samordna informationsstyrningsinitiativ inom affärsenheten SAK. Du fungerar som en central kontaktpunkt och möjliggörare för enhetlig och hållbar informationshantering, samt samarbetar nära både verksamhets- och IT-ledare. Med din förståelse för affärens behov engagerar och stöttar du organisationen i att utveckla och implementera effektiva arbetssätt för informationsstyrning.
   

  

 Dina arbetsuppgifter kommer vara bland annat:
   

  

* Löpande stötta och engagera verksamheten i deras arbete med informationsstyrning
* Utveckla arbetssätt för informationsarkitektur och stödja utrullningen av dessa
* Följa upp och rapportera till SAK Styrgrupp Informationsstyrning om aktiviteter och effektivitet
* Utforma och genomföra utbildningsinsatser inom informationsarkitektur
* Administrera processer, rutiner, policys och verktyg för informationsstyrning
* Granska och godkänna leveranser från arbetsgrupper inom området
* Fånga upp och vägleda frågor av taktisk och operativ karaktär
* Följa upp milstolpar och KPI:er samt kommunicera dessa till styrgruppen
* Leda och samordna informationsstyrningsarbetet på övergripande nivå
* Skapa gränssnitt och möjliggöra effektiv samverkan mellan verksamhet, IT och nyckelroller
* Kommunicera beslut från dataansvariga till intressenter
* Hantera backlog och koordinera roller inom informationsstyrningen
* Driva granskning av datakvalitet och uppföljning av mätetal
* Agera primär eskaleringspunkt till exekutiva sponsorer


 Följande kommer göra dig framgångsrik i denna tjänst:
   

  

* Akademisk examen på kandidatnivå inom datavetenskap eller motsvarande
* Några års erfarenhet inom bank, försäkring eller annan reglerad bransch
* Erfarenhet av att leda och samordna större projekt på strategisk nivå inom informationsstyrning eller datastyrning
* Erfarenhet av förändringsledning i komplex verksamhet
* Kompetens i ramverk inom informationsstyrning och tillämpning av praxis
* Verksamhetsförståelse från försäkringsverksamhet
* Kännedom om EA-verktyg
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med datakataloger såsom Databricks Unity Catalog, Alation eller Microsoft Purview
* Goda kunskaper i Svenska och Engelska, tal och skrift


 Meriterande är även om du har:
   

  

* Kompletterande kurser och/eller certifieringar inom verksamhets-, lösnings- eller informationsarkitektur
* Erfarenhet av federerad informationsstyrning


 Som person har du en djup förståelse för olika datakonsumenters varierande behov och en god strategisk insikt. Du är en problemlösare med ett systematiskt och resultatorienterat arbetssätt. Att bygga relationer och skapa ett brett kontaktnät faller dig naturligt, och du har mycket god kommunikationsförmåga – både för tekniska och icke-tekniska målgrupper. Du leder både dig själv och andra på ett motiverande, engagerande och tydligt sätt.
   

  

**Om oss**
 Som Informationsstyrningsansvarig SAK blir du en nyckelspelare i vår strategiska satsning på att skapa affärsvärde ur information. Du får möjlighet att leda arbetet med att omsätta data till en strategisk resurs för verksamheten och bidra till att vi kan nyttja data för avancerad analys och AI inom flera funktioner.
   

  

 Kontaktpersoner
   

  

 Rekryterande Chef :Stefan Kronqvist stefan.kronqvist@lansforsakringar.se
   

  

 Fackförening Akademikerföreningen: Maria Eriksson maria.eriksson@lansforsakringar.se
   

  

 Fackförening Forena : Susanne Hirsch susanne.hirsch2@lansforsakringar.se
   

  

**Mer information**
*Låter det spännande? Då vill vi veta mer om dig! Välkommen med din ansökan redan idag. Vi arbetar löpande med denna rekrytering och kan komma att tillsätta tjänsten innan sista ansökningsdag.*
**Vi vill informera dig som söker tjänst hos oss att vi under jul- och nyårshelgerna har begränsad bemanning. Det kan därför dröja något längre än vanligt innan du får återkoppling från oss. Vi tackar för din förståelse och ser fram emot att återkomma till dig så snart som möjligt efter julledigheten.**
**God jul och gott nytt år!**
 Länsförsäkringar AB är en inkluderande arbetsplats där mod, möjligheter och engagemang står i centrum. Vi erbjuder ett hållbart arbetsliv med flexibla villkor och satsar på att alla medarbetare ska kunna växa och trivas, oavsett bakgrund.
   

  

 Affärsenhet Sak är länsförsäkringsgruppens drivkraft inom sakförsäkring. Vi utvecklar nya affärer, skapar smarta försäkringslösningar och ser till att kunderna alltid har trygghet i vardagen. Vi står bakom gemensamma koncept, digital försäljning och kundkommunikation – och vi kompletterar bolagens erbjudanden med specialprodukter som gör skillnad.
   

  

 Hos oss får du vara med och forma framtidens försäkring – där innovation möter samhällsnytta.

title: SAP-konsult, Stockholm
description:
Känner du dig nyfiken på nya utmaningar? Vill du jobba på en flexibel arbetsplats med spännande uppdrag inom SAP?
   

  

 Nu söker vi erfarna SAP-konsulter till vårt team i Stockholm, som är en del av vår nationella SAP Practice där vi jobbar tillsammans med SAP i fokus. Nu sker en renässans inom SAP med SAP S/4HANA, SAP Business Technology Platform, Embedded Analytics med mera. Det innebär att företag som använder SAP står inför helt nya utmaningar och möjligheter. Vill du vara med på denna resa?
   

  

 Välkommen till oss på CGI!
   

  

 Your future duties and responsibilities
   

  

**Required Qualifications To Be Successful In This Role**
**Together, as owners, let’s turn meaningful insights into action.**
 Life at CGI is rooted in ownership, teamwork, respect and belonging. Here, you’ll reach your full potential because…
   

  

 You are invited to be an owner from day 1 as we work together to bring our Dream to life. That’s why we call ourselves CGI Partners rather than employees. We benefit from our collective success and actively shape our company’s strategy and direction.
   

  

 Your work creates value. You’ll develop innovative solutions and build relationships with teammates and clients while accessing global capabilities to scale your ideas, embrace new opportunities, and benefit from expansive industry and technology expertise.
   

  

 You’ll shape your career by joining a company built to grow and last. You’ll be supported by leaders who care about your health and well-being and provide you with opportunities to deepen your skills and broaden your horizons.
   

  

 Come join our team—one of the largest IT and business consulting services firms in the world.

title: (Senior) IT Consultant - Enterprise Solutions | BCG Platinion
description:
Who We Are
   

  

 Do you want to turn the challenges of digitalization into the solutions of the future? Join BCG Platinion in tackling the core IT issues of leading global companies. Deploy customized platforms, architectures, strategies, and organizations to leverage the digital potential of our customers and drive true innovation, with state-of-the-art tools such as cloud computing, AI, blockchain, microservices, and containerization. Add your individual strengths to our unique team, always there to support you. Together with Boston Consulting Group and our clients, we turn digital visions into reality.
   

  

 What You'll Do
   

  

 For our Nordic offices (Stockholm, Oslo, Helsinki and Copenhagen), we are looking for (Senior) IT Consultants for our Enterprise Solutions chapter! About The Job At BCG Platinion, we provide sound advice on all relevant IT issues. In particular, the migration to the SAP S/4HANA solution against the background of the planned mainstream maintenance presents our customers with special challenges. The typical questions our customers have range from justification and business benefits of the SAP S/4 HANA Transition to optimized roadmaps taking into account the implications on overall architecture and also alternative solutions and platforms. To serve our customers even better, we would like to strengthen our Enterprise Solutions team. You work together with colleagues from Platinion and/or the Boston Consulting Group on local and international customer projects. Together with our customers, you actively develop superior, business value driven ERP and application architecture strategies, concepts and roadmaps and apply your sound technical and process-related understanding. Last but not least, you enjoy your work and embody the 'BCG Platinion Spirit' with your hands-on manner.
   

  

 What You'll Bring
   

  

**This Is How You Make a Difference**
* An above-average degree in computer science, business informatics, business administration or a related field
* At least 3 years of relevant experience in the context of strategic ERP/CRM/SCM projects
* Technical knowledge along typical end-to-end processes relevant in the enterprise solutions context (Purchase-2-Pay, Order-2-Cash, Lead-2-Quote, Record-2-Report, Hire-2-Retire etc.)
* General knowledge of wider portfolio of industry specific solutions, solution add-on’s and analytical tools Exceptional analytical and conceptual skills
* Fluent in one Nordic Language and English (written and spoken)
* Strong client and result orientation
* Team spirit, communication and presentation skills as well as intellectual agility
* Ability to align individuals and organizations to a common goal


 Who You'll Work With
   

  

**Shape The World Of Tomorrow**
* Supporting the client in ERP/CRM/SCM projects along the entire supply chain: from requirements analysis to solution design/technical concept, implementation, testing, training and rollout
* Design / definition of specific ERP/CRM/SCM solutions along the value chain of our clients and the required functional modules Introduction of 'best practices' in the evaluation, specification and implementation of user requirements, in particular with a view to reducing one-off and maintenance costs
* Technical management of implementation and migration projects or in specific domains Requirements management within the scope of enterprise solutions projects, incl. the management of specialist concept workshops with business process managers
* Control and prototyping of customizing of ERP/CRM/SCM solutions Support in the sale of large Enterprise Solutions projects by providing technical and methodological expertise
* Further development of the content of the enterprise solutions topics at BCG Platinion, e.g., through participation in conferences, in the creation of a training catalog or with technical articles


 Additional info
   

  

**How You Can Grow With Us**
 We guarantee constant development incentives in an open and rewarding work environment! Together with a dedicated team of talented colleagues, you get to work on new challenges every day. Individual training offers and a culture of open feedback will provide the framework needed to explore and perfect personal strengths. Our modern structures allow focusing on the essence of our work - with easy travel booking, an excellent back-office support and comprehensive Knowledge Center. With our regular office Fridays and legendary events, we nurture a strong and close team network beyond our case work.
   

  

**Become a Part Of Our Team**
 Apply over our online portal now, with your CV, a relevant project list, and all pertinent references.
   

  

*BCG Platinion is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to national origin, color, age, sex, gender identity / expression, sexual orientation, religion, disability or any other protected characteristic.*
*#BCGPlatinion*
 Boston Consulting Group is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, age, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity / expression, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected under national, provincial, or local law, where applicable, and those with criminal histories will be considered in a manner consistent with applicable state and local laws.
   

  

 BCG is an E - Verify Employer. Click here for more information on E-Verify.

title: Senior AI/ML Engineer
description:
**Craft:**
 Data, Analytics & Strategy
   

  

**Job Description:**
**Senior AI/ML Engineer**
**Job Description**
 Are you passionate about solving complex Machine Learning challenges at massive scale? Do you want to build systems that don’t just power features - but redefine how a global game operates?
   

  

 Join us as a Senior AI/ML Engineer and help shape the future of AI and decision automation at King.
   

  

**Your role within our Kingdom**
 You’ll be part of the Decision Automation team for Candy Crush Saga - a cross-functional team focused on enabling Faster. Smarter. Player-centric decisions at scale.
   

  

 Working alongside analysts, product managers, game designers, and AI/ML engineers, you’ll lead the design and implementation of ML systems that:
   

  

* Automate complex decision workflows.
* Personalize experiences for hundreds of millions of players.
* Reduce manual operational load while boosting impact and efficiency.


 Our mission? To change how Candy makes decisions - moving from manual, feature-by-feature tuning to real-time, player-centric decision automation. From in app purchase offer optimization to feature personalization, your work will directly shape how Candy Crush Saga evolves and delivers joy to players around the world.
   

  

 With 250+ million monthly active users, the scale is enormous - and so is the opportunity. This role demands both deep technical expertise and strong stakeholder management - influencing strategy, aligning diverse teams, mentoring peers, and representing our work across King.
   

  

**Skills To Create Thrills**
 So, what about you? You’re not only a technical expert but also a collaborative leader who thrives in complex, fast-moving environments. You have experience in several of the following areas:
   

  

 Core Expertise
   

  

* Advanced degree (MS/PhD) in Computer Science, Engineering, Physics, Mathematics, or a related field - or equivalent experience.
* Proven experience of applying Machine Learning in production, covering the full lifecycle: prototyping, training, serving, and monitoring.
* Strong foundation in advanced ML and data science concepts, with a proven ability to apply them in large-scale systems.


 Practical Software Skills
   

  

* Proficient with GCP data products (Vertex AI, BigQuery, Cloud Storage, Dataflow, Pub/Sub).
* Strong software engineering fundamentals, including CI/CD for ML workflows.
* Experience designing robust, scalable, and maintainable ML systems in collaboration with MLOps.


 Collaboration & Leadership
   

  

* Proven ability to lead cross-functional projects with accountability for delivery and quality.
* Skilled at managing diverse stakeholders - from game designers and product managers to data analysts - balancing technical depth with clear, outcome-focused communication.
* Comfortable operating in fast-changing environments, bringing clarity and direction amid ambiguity.
* A supportive mentor and coach who helps others grow while fostering a culture of collaboration and learning


**Tasty Bonus Skills**
 Have any sweet experiences with some of these? Then we’d love to hear about it!
   

  

* LLM-based AI agents, contextual multi-armed bandits or causal ML.
* A love for games - whether it’s mobile, console, or board games!


**About King**
 With a mission of
 *Making the World Playful* 
 , King is a leading interactive entertainment company with more than 20 years of history of delivering some of the world’s most iconic games in the mobile gaming industry, including the world-famous Candy Crush franchise, as well as other mobile game hits such as
 *Farm Heroes Sag* 
 a. King games are played by more than 200 million monthly active users. King, part of Microsoft (NASDAQ: MSFT), has Kingsters in Stockholm, Malmö, London, Barcelona, Berlin, Dublin, San Francisco, New York, Los Angeles and Malta. More information can be found at King.com or by following us on LinkedIn, @lifeatking on Instagram, or @king\_games on X.

title: Projektledare digitalisering & verksamhet - Telge
description:
Välj Telge - här får du kombinera affärsmässighet med samhällsnytta och som medarbetare får du frihet under ansvar och möjlighet att påverka.
   

  

 Så här säger Johan Sergelius, rekryterande chef om rollen:
   

  

 "I din roll som projektledare får du innehållsrika och omväxlande dagar. Du kommer att driva varierande typer av uppdrag, projekt och program - allt från strategiska initiativ till operativa förbättringar. Hos oss får du möjlighet att arbeta nära verksamheten och skapa verklig nytta."
   

  

**Uppdrag och kompetenskrav**
 Södertälje växer och vi på Telge AB är en viktig del av resan. Nu söker vi en erfaren projektledare som vill driva spännande projekt inom digitalisering och IT. Du får en central roll i att planera, koordinera och genomföra projekt som bidrar till en smartare och mer hållbar stad. Exempel på projekt kan vara införande av nya AI lösningar, utveckling av datadrivna beslutsstöd, samt automatisera processer som stärker hela kommunkoncernen. Du arbetar brett inom kommunkoncernen och blir en del av ett engagerat team som kombinerar struktur med kreativitet. Hos oss gör din kompetens verklig skillnad. I rollen ansvarar du för att driva och leda projekt samt att säkerställa kvalitet, tid och budget. Du blir också en del av vårt projektkontor där du bidrar till att förvalta och vidareutveckla våra metodiker inom
   

  

 projektledning, förändringsledning och nyttorealisering. Du leder digitaliserings- och verksamhetsprojekt enligt XLPM, analyserar direktiv och kravbild, planerar, organiserar och leder projektteam mot fastställda mål. Vidare ingår att hantera ekonomi, uppföljning och rapportering, stötta våra kunder med effekthemtagning och nyttorealisering och att ha en tät dialog med leverantörer och bygga goda relationer med våra kunder inom kommunkoncernen.
   

  

**För att passa i rollen ser vi att du har:**
* Eftergymnasial utbildning, gärna med IT-inriktning eller motsvarande kompetens förvärvad på annat sätt
* Flera års erfarenhet av komplexa projekt, gärna inom digitalisering/verksamhetsutveckling
* Erfarenhet av projektmetodik såsom XLPM eller motsvarande, och av agila arbetssätt och vattenfallsmetoder


**Meriterande** 
 :
   

  

* Certifiering inom exempelvis IPMA, PMI eller Prince2, liksom kunskap om PM3 och ITIL
* Erfarenhet av projektverktyg som Antura eller liknande


 Som person ser vi att du är självständig, uthållig och kan jobba målmedvetet mot överenskomna leveransmål. Du är ansvarsfull, har förmågan att prioritera och ser helheten ur ett koncernperspektiv. Vi ser också att du har erfarenhet av att ställa krav mot leverantörer och har lätt för att uttrycka dig i tal och skrift.
   

  

**Välj Telge**
 Inom Telge finns alla möjligheter för dig att själv forma din framtid. Här finns det plats att växa, både i din yrkesroll och som människa. Telge är en arbetsplats med trygga anställningsvillkor. Du som anställd hos oss omfattas av kollektivavtal där viktiga saker som försäkringar och pension ingår.
   

  

 Här får du mindre pussel och mer liv. Att ha balans mellan arbetslivet och den privata sfären är viktig för ett hållbart liv. Så långt det är möjligt har vi flexibla arbetstider där var och en styr över sin tid. Vi har en rad förmåner som friskvårdsbidrag och möjlighet till löneväxling så att du kan växla in din lön mot extra tjänstepensionssparande.
   

  

**Mångfald inkludering och trygghet**
 Vi på Telge arbetar aktivt för mångfald och inkludering och välkomnar därför medarbetare med olika erfarenheter, bakgrunder och kompetenser. En trygg och säker arbetsmiljö är vår högsta prioritet. Arbetspsykologiska tester ingår i våra rekryteringsprocesser till chefs- och specialisttjänster och vi genomför återkommande, slumpmässiga drogtester bland alla våra medarbetare.
   

  

**Sista ansökningsdatum**
 7 januari 2026
   

  

**Några frågor?**
 Vill du veta mer om tjänsten eller har frågor om rekryteringsprocessen? I den här rekryteringen samarbetar vi med Experis IT. Vid frågor är du välkommen att kontakta ansvarig rekryteringskonsult Pia Boström på 0703-14 68 66 eller pia.bostrom@se.experis.com. Fackliga kontakter är vision@telge.se för Vision, Magnus Enderin för SACO, Jessica Borgen för Kommunal. Dessa nås på 08-550 220 00.

title: Account Executive Sweden (all genders)
description:
**Job Details**
* Location: Anywhere in Sweden works
* Languages: Swedish (Native level), English (Fluent); German is a plus
* Experience: 5+ years in outbound sales roles
* Contract: Full-time, permanent


 🚀 Join fiskaly! Help Us Simplify Receipts for Millions
   

  

 Millions of people interact with fiskaly every day, even if they don’t realize it. As a B2B company, we power the retail technology behind digital receipts and secure, legally compliant transactions. In Italy, we help retailers go fully digital and eliminate the need for hardware like fiscal printers to issue and manage receipts.
   

  

 By making receipts tamper-proof through digital signatures, we help fight tax fraud. And with our paperless receipt solution, we offer consumers a modern alternative while helping merchants streamline their operations.
   

  

 Sure, our solutions sound complex but our mission is simple: make receipts easy for everyone.
   

  

 💼 The Role
   

  

 You will be the engine of our growth in
 **Sweden** 
 . Your primary focus is
 **New Business** 
 . You will target POS vendors, software agencies, and retail tech providers who need to integrate fiscal compliance.
   

  

 This is an outbound-heavy role, but we do it the smart way. You won't be manually researching emails for hours. You will leverage Sales Intelligence and AI tools to build targeted lists, craft hyper-personalized outreach, and get in front of decision-makers faster. Your goal is to build a qualified pipeline that fuels our expansion in the North.
   

  

 🛠️ What You’ll Do
   

  

* Execute a high-volume, high-quality outbound strategy, identifying and contacting key decision-makers (CTOs, Product Managers) at Swedish and Nordic software companies.
* Own the full sales cycle for mid-market accounts and the early stages (qualification) for enterprise deals, managing relationships from "Hello" to "Handover/Close."
* Leverage AI writing assistants and sales intelligence tools (e.g., LinkedIn Sales Nav, Apollo) to research prospects and draft personalized outreach at scale.
* Conduct discovery calls to deeply understand the prospect's technical and business pain points (e.g., "Why is your current physical control unit slowing down your rollout?").
* Work closely with Marketing to refine our messaging, ensuring our value proposition resonates with local Swedish market nuances.
* Maintain impeccable CRM hygiene, logging all activities and insights so that our forecasting remains accurate.
* Attend key industry events in Stockholm and across the region to build a network within the retail-tech community.


 👀 What You Bring
   

  

* 5+ years of proven experience in outbound sales or business development (SDR/BDR/AE), ideally within the SaaS or Retail Tech sector.
* Native-level Swedish and fluent English are non-negotiable. You need to sell to locals in their language and report to HQ in English.
* A "Hunter" mentality with a track record of generating your own pipeline and meeting outreach targets consistently.
* Tech-Savvy: You are comfortable using modern sales stacks (CRM, Sales Nav, Outreach tools) and are eager to use AI to speed up your workflow.
* Curiosity: You can grasp technical concepts quickly. You don't need to be a dev, but you need to understand why a Cloud API is better than a physical "black box" at the counter.
* A proactive, organized approach: You don't wait for leads to be given to you; you go out and create them


 ✅ What We Offer
   

  

* A team that gives you space to grow, take ownership, and learn from trying
* 25 vacation days per year
* Flexible working hours and a hybrid work setup
* Budget for personal and professional development
* Hardware of your choice (Windows, Linux, or Mac)
* A company culture that values clarity, well-being, and good work over noise


 ✨ Why fiskaly?
   

  

 We work on real problems that have impact, not vanity projects. Our team is pragmatic, direct, and focused on building solid tech for an industry that needs it. We care about how things work, not how they look on paper.
   

  

 If that resonates, you’ll probably enjoy working here.

title: Customer Support Engineer – LC/LCMS HPLC – Göteborg
description:
**Job Description**
 Agilent inspires and supports discoveries that advance the quality of life. We provide life science, diagnostic and applied market laboratories worldwide with instruments, services, consumables, applications and expertise. Agilent enables customers to gain the answers and insights they seek –– so they can do what they do best: improve the world around us. Information about Agilent is available at www.agilent.com.
   

  

 Every day, Agilent Customer Support Engineers help customers solve issues at labs where scientists are making discoveries that enhance the quality of life. Through our work, we deliver insights and provide support that keep labs running smoothly and more efficiently. Join our dynamic organization to be a part of this rewarding work.
   

  

**Location: Sweden**
 As a Customer Support Engineer in Sweden, you will work at a variety of labs supporting customers using our chromatography product line. You will have worked with chromatography instrumentation, methods and applications and are looking to become an expert with our products.
   

  

 Applying your creativity, complex problem-solving skills, and can-do attitude is essential. Compliance and reporting are also important responsibilities, such as documenting and ordering components using a variety of databases. Having a natural instinct to deliver the highest-levels of customer service is vital.
   

  

**Your tasks:**
 Responsible for supporting customers through on-site activities such as installation, implementation, maintenance and repair of company and multi-vendor systems solutions which may include hardware, software and networking products as well as operating systems.
   

  

* Installs and optimizes hardware/software/network products and configurations at customer sites.
* Diagnoses and resolves product performance problems.
* Performs maintenance and repair services.
* Ensures customer satisfaction by advising customers on preventive maintenance and configurations, which may impact product performance.
* Proactively responds to potential equipment or software issues to prevent unplanned interruption of customers' business.
* Delivers (does not design) fully integrated solutions, which may include peripherals, communications, operating systems and applications software.
* Serves as an internal resource on technical issues and manages product escalations Collaborates with Agilent teams such as Support, Sales, Marketing and R&D to provide solutions to customers.
* May have knowledge of third-party products.
* May deliver internal technical training and maintenance seminars and workshops for field engineers or customers.
* May train other field engineers or customers.
* May calibrate equipment on-site for large volume customers.
* May qualify leads.
* Must consent to participate and meet Agilent approved customer/vendor credentialing
* Requirements necessary to gain access to customer sites. Requirements may include, but are not limited to, proof of identification, proof of certification to
* Perform the work required, customer health and safety requirements, etc.


**Qualifications**
**Apart from these more technical skills, we are also looking for:**
* a strong desire to learn and expand your skill set,
* enjoy engaging and visiting customers on-site,
* a strong attention to detail and processes, ensuring compliance with Agilent's Quality standards,
* ability to handle customer expectations and balance customer requirements with business needs,
* valid driving license


 Proximity to an international airport would be an advantage for travelling.
   

  

**Your profile:**
* You have a degree in the fields of Chemistry, Biochemistry or similar
* Good knowledge in Chromatography – both LC and LCMS and special valves is a plus.
* Experience with the Agilent solutions is a plus but not a requirement
* Excellent verbal and written communication skills
* Fluent in English & Swedish
* You enjoy travelling and meeting customers every day


 Application:
   

  

 Please forward your application and CV as soon as possible via our online recruitment system.
   

  

**Additional Details**
 This job has a full time weekly schedule. It includes the option to work remotely.
   

  

 Our pay ranges are determined by role, level, and location. Within the range, individual pay is determined by work location and additional factors, including job-related skills, experience, and relevant education or training. During the hiring process, a recruiter can share more about the specific pay range for a preferred location. Pay and benefit information by country are available at: https://careers.agilent.com/locations
   

  

 Agilent Technologies Inc. is an equal opportunity employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status, disability or any other protected categories under all applicable laws.
   

  

**Travel Required:**
 50% of the Time
   

  

**Shift:**
 Day
   

  

**Duration:**
 No End Date
   

  

**Job Function:**
 Services & Support

title: Dataarkitekt - Vivicta
description:
As of 2 September 2025, Vivicta, former Tietoevry Tech Services, now operates as a standalone company under our new brand. We’ve officially launched Vivicta, your trusted Nordic transformation partner, making everyday easier through technology. You can explore more about our brand and what we stand for at https://www.vivicta.com
   

  

 Ready to join us? Click ‘Apply’ and complete our short application form to get started. Prefer another option? Apply via LinkedIn to automatically populate your details using your profile.
   

  

 Brinner du för att använda kraften i data och AI för att skapa affärsvärde och driva digital transformation? Har du erfarenhet av att designa datadrivna lösningar och vägleda kunder mot strategiska beslut?
   

  

 Vi söker nu en arkitekt inom Data, Analytics och AI! Hos oss blir du en del av ett team som leder datadrivna transformationer och hjälper våra kunder att utveckla sina affärsprocesser, applikationer och IT-infrastruktur på den nordiska marknaden.
   

  

**Som Data arkitekt inom Data, Analytics & AI hos Vivicta kommer du att:**
* Designa och leda implementeringen av arkitekturer för avancerade data- och analyslösningar.
* Arbeta nära våra kunder för att förstå, definiera och prioritera deras behov samt utveckla skräddarsydda lösningar som skapar affärsvärde.
* Utvärdera och rekommendera teknologier och verktyg som stödjer datainsamling, hantering och analys.
* Leda workshops och utbildningar för att stärka kundens förståelse och kompetens inom data och analytics.
* Bidra till utvecklingen av vårt svenska team och våra erbjudanden på den svenska marknaden.
* Driva kundnära implementationsprojekt och agera som nyckelperson mellan beställare, leveransteam och interna kundteam.


**Vi Söker Dig Som Har**
* Flera års erfarenhet av att arbeta med data- och analyslösningar, både i molnbaserade miljöer och traditionella on-prem-lösningar.
* Djup kunskap om arkitekturprinciper och moderna datateknologier inom data- och analytics-området.
* Förmåga att kommunicera tydligt och förklara komplexa koncept på ett enkelt sätt för kunder med varierande kunskap och erfarenhet.
* Det är fördelaktigt om du har erfarenhet av hybridleveranser med kombination av lokala resurser och near- och/eller offshore-enheter
* Du är flexibel, en problemlösare och uppskattar att arbeta såväl självständigt som i team.
* Du är flytande i svenska och engelska, såväl i tal som i skrift


**Vi Erbjuder Dig**
 Vi erbjuder dig professionell tillväxt, meningsfulla projekt, en öppen kultur och en enastående balans mellan arbete och fritid. Vi erbjuder dig även en möjlighet att skapa framtiden för en växande, snabbt utvecklande och viktig sektor. Vi tror att vår organisationskultur är en viktig del av att möjliggöra din framgång
 *. Vi tillhandahåller en flexibel hybrid arbetsmodell som en del av vår kultur och vårt arbetssätt.*
**Låter det inspirerande?**
 Vi ser fram emot din ansökan. Vänligen bifoga ditt CV eller din LinkedIn-profil så kontaktar vi dig. Intervjuer kommer att hållas löpande, så vi uppmuntrar dig att ansöka redan idag. Om du har några frågor angående denna roll, vänligen kontakta rekryteringschef Mikael Johansson, mikael.v.johansson@tietoevry.com.
   

  

 Vi hoppas att höra från dig snart.
   

  

*Vi utför bakgrundskontroller av alla slutkandidater.
   

  

 Vivicta tackar nej till samtal från rekryteringsföretag.*

title: Client Executive Insurance
description:
Are you interested in working for an international company with high-performing colleagues and international clients? Marsh AB is now looking for a Client Executive to join our Corporate team. This role is for you who enjoy working with sales and customer relationships. At Marsh, you will have the opportunity to influence the company’s operations, develop professionally, and become part of a team with competent and inspiring colleagues in an international environment.
   

  

**About the role:**
 The responsibilities include taking full ownership of your clients and developing the business with them where you see potential to broaden or deepen it. You manage and develop the clients, ensure they receive the best solutions, and you have an underlying profitability responsibility. The right service to the right client. You also have an interest in meeting new companies and contributing to expanding Marsh’s client portfolio. You work both administratively and communicatively and build and maintain strong working relationships with internal and external stakeholders.
   

  

**Examples of tasks include:**
* Assisting our clients with relevant advice regarding risk and insurance
* Conducting strategic dialogues with the contact person, often the CEO or CFO
* Leading projects and being the coordinating contact towards the client
* Delivering services personally, but also having the ability to project manage specialists and risk engineers performing work for the client
* Identifying new business opportunities with your clients and proactively working to broaden Marsh’s business
* Contacting new potential clients


**We are looking for someone who:**
* Has 3+ years of experience in a similar role
* Preferably holds an academic degree in law, economics, or engineering
* Has good communication skills
* Is structured, meets deadlines, and can handle multiple tasks simultaneously
* Values service and always puts the client first
* Enjoys working independently but also finds collaboration rewarding
* To thrive at Marsh, we believe you are attracted to being part of a large, global organization and find insurance an interesting field


**We offer you:**
* To become part of a great team with competent colleagues and a positive work climate
* A varied role with great potential for significant personal responsibility
* Many different points of contact, both internally and externally
* For the right person, there are great development opportunities within the role
* Location in central Stockholm
* A permanent position with a start date by agreement


 Marsh, a business of Marsh McLennan (NYSE: MMC), is the world’s top insurance broker and risk advisor. Marsh McLennan is a global leader in risk, strategy and people, advising clients in 130 countries across four businesses: Marsh, Guy Carpenter, Mercer and Oliver Wyman. With annual revenue of $24 billion and more than 90,000 colleagues, Marsh McLennan helps build the confidence to thrive through the power of perspective. For more information, visit marsh.com, or follow on LinkedIn and X.
   

  

 Marsh McLennan is committed to creating a diverse, inclusive and flexible work environment. We aim to attract and retain the best people and embrace diversity of age, background, disability, ethnic origin, family duties, gender orientation or expression, marital status, nationality, parental status, personal or social status, political affiliation, race, religion and beliefs, sex/gender, sexual orientation or expression, skin color, or any other characteristic protected by applicable law.
   

  

 Marsh McLennan is committed to hybrid work, which includes the flexibility of working remotely and the collaboration, connections and professional development benefits of working together in the office. All Marsh McLennan colleagues are expected to be in their local office or working onsite with clients at least three days per week. Office-based teams will identify at least one “anchor day” per week on which their full team will be together in person.
   

  

**R\_326982**

title: SAP Functional Lead - Planning and Logistics
description:
Do you want to work in a global company where you can contribute to a more sustainable food production? DeLaval is a leading developer, manufacturer and supplier of solutions for dairy farmers around the world. As a company built on innovation, we constantly work to find ways of helping our customers do more with less.
   

  

 DeLaval is a leading developer, manufacturer, and supplier of solutions for dairy farmers worldwide. Built on innovation, we constantly strive to help our customers do more with less.
   

  

 We are undergoing a major business transformation – Programme One: Greenfield implementation of SAP S/4HANA to support our future business model. A key role in this journey is our SAP Functional Lead for Planning & Logistics, who will shape the design and implementation of advanced planning solutions in one of DeLaval’s largest transformation programs ever.
   

  

**Purpose Of Role And Key Responsibilities**
 As SAP Functional Lead, you will act as a senior solution designer and trusted business advisor with deep expertise in planning processes. You will collaborate closely with business stakeholders, IT teams, SAP, and our implementation partners to deliver best-in-class solutions. Your mission: driving standardization, harmonization, and simplification across our global operations.
   

  

**Specific Tasks Include** 
  

  

* Lead the design and implementation of SAP S/4HANA planning and logistics processes, focusing on:
+ Demand Planning
+ Inventory Planning
+ Material Requirements Planning
+ Sales and Operations Planning (S&OP)
+ Variant Configuration

* Translate complex business requirements into scalable SAP solutions aligned with best practices and TCO principles.
* Ensure compliance with design principles and maintain guidelines and documentation.
* Act as a gatekeeper for solution integrity during the transformation and beyond.
* After go-live, join the SAP Center of Excellence to support continuous improvement and innovation.


**Qualifications**
 We are looking for a proactive team member who will add value to our program with their SAP, technology, and business competence.
   

  

 To be successful in this role, we believe that you:
   

  

* 5+ years of experience in senior SAP roles, with proven expertise in planning and logistics within SAP S/4HANA.
* Have been involved in large SAP implementations, preferably greenfield projects.
* Hands-on experience with IBP, APO, MRP, aATP, and PPDS; knowledge of integration with other modules (MM, SD) is a plus.
* Have a strong understanding of SAP software and its capabilities, as well as experience in designing and implementing SAP solutions.
* Experience in large-scale SAP implementations, preferably greenfield projects.
* Strong understanding of SAP best practices, solution architecture, and tools.
* A Master’s degree in engineering, IT, or equivalent experience.
* Excellent communication skills and fluency in English.


 We are looking for someone with a genuine interest in business processes and how IT can drive improvements. You bring drive, leadership, and a positive attitude – you’re not afraid to speak up and share your opinions, supported by guiding principles, target architecture, and established ways of working. You are confident in making decisions and actively contribute to decision-making processes.
